answers.answer: Hi there!Both these are oral hypoglycemic agents and have been proved effective in management of diabetes. However their use is suggested only after prior consultation and written prescription by a medical practioner; after taking the side effect profile into consideration on individual basis. You could read more about the medications online and discuss this with your treating endocrinologist.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: Does anyone have any experience using Onglyza or Januvia?
title: Onglyza vs Januvia
